persistency

Enum PersonMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<PersonMapper>
      • persistency.PersonMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<PersonMapper>

    public enum PersonMapper
extends Enum<PersonMapper>
    Singleton class: maps Person objects to Person DB-table.
    Author:
    Koen Pelsmaekers

      • createPerson

        public int createPerson(Person person)
        Store a person in the database; new Java 7 try-with-resources used
        Parameters:
        person - The Person object that needs to be stored
        Returns:
        The ID for the customer that is inserted, -1 if the insert did not succeed

      • deletePerson

        public int deletePerson(int id)
        Delete a person from de database
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the Person to be deleted
        Returns:
        Number of rows affected (should be 1)

      • updatePerson

        public int updatePerson(Person person)
        Update the columns of a person in de database
        Parameters:
        person - The Person object with the new data
        Returns:
        Number of rows affected (should be 1)
